reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 103/02: EXTENDING TERM OF VALIDITY OF LOAD BROKER CERTIFICATES
reg_info.reg_name_text: EXTENDING TERM OF VALIDITY OF LOAD BROKER CERTIFICATES
reg_info.act_under: Truck Transportation Act   Loi sur le camionnage

content.content: 1. Despite subsection 3 (1) of Ontario Regulation 556/92, the term of validity of a load broker certificate is extended beyond the expiry date shown on the certificate until the date this Regulation is revoked if, without the extension, the certificate would expire on or after the day this Regulation comes into force. O. Reg. 103/02, s. 1.
content.raw_html: 1. Despite subsection 3 (1) of Ontario Regulation 556/92, the term of validity of a load broker certificate is extended beyond the expiry date shown on the certificate until the date this Regulation is revoked if, without the extension, the certificate would expire on or after the day this Regulation comes into force. O. Reg. 103/02, s. 1.
